statements: SELECT * FROM FoodDistributionNetwork WHERE distributor_name = 'ABC Distribution'
SELECT id, distributor_name, location FROM FoodDistributionNetwork WHERE food_category = 'Vegetables'
SELECT distributor_name, contact_number FROM FoodDistributionNetwork WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY distributor_name ASC
SELECT * FROM FoodDistributionNetwork WHERE distribution_capacity > 50 ORDER BY distributor_name DESC
SELECT contact_number, location FROM FoodDistributionNetwork WHERE food_category = 'Fruits' AND location LIKE '%City%'
SELECT * FROM FoodDistributionNetwork WHERE distributor_name = 'Healthy Foods' AND food_category = 'Vegetables'
SELECT id, distributor_name, location FROM FoodDistributionNetwork WHERE distribution_capacity >= 100 ORDER BY distributor_name ASC
SELECT contact_number FROM FoodDistributionNetwork WHERE food_category IN ('Fruits', 'Dairy') ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_distributors FROM FoodDistributionNetwork WHERE location LIKE '%City%'
SELECT id, distributor_name, location, distribution_capacity FROM FoodDistributionNetwork WHERE location IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM distribution_centers;
SELECT name, capacity FROM distribution_centers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, name, location FROM distribution_centers WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT name, category, quantity FROM food_items WHERE expiration > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM food_items WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM distribution_centers WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, location, capacity FROM distribution_centers WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM food_items WHERE category = 'Fruits' ORDER BY expiration ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT id, name, location, capacity FROM distribution_centers WHERE location LIKE '%New York%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM food_items WHERE expiration > '2022-09-30' ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM FoodDistributor ORDER BY distributor_id DESC;
SELECT distributor_id, distributor_name FROM FoodDistributor WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM FoodInventory WHERE distributor_id = 2;
SELECT distributor_name FROM FoodDistributor WHERE distributor_id = 3 OR region_id = 4;
SELECT distributor_name, food_item FROM FoodDistributor INNER JOIN FoodInventory ON FoodDistributor.distributor_id = FoodInventory.distributor_id;
SELECT * FROM FoodDistributor ORDER BY distributor_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT distributor_name, region_id FROM FoodDistributor WHERE region_id = 2;
SELECT distributor_name, quantity FROM FoodDistributor JOIN FoodInventory ON FoodDistributor.distributor_id = FoodInventory.distributor_id ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT region_id FROM FoodDistributor;
SELECT * FROM FoodDistributor WHERE distributor_id IN (SELECT distributor_id FROM FoodInventory WHERE quantity > 50);
SELECT * FROM distribution_centers;
SELECT id, name, location FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT name, category, price FROM food_products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, supplier_id, food_product_id, quantity, date FROM distribution_records WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT name, location, contact_person FROM suppliers ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM distribution_centers WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT name, location FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT name, category, price FROM food_products WHERE category = 'Dairy' ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT d.name AS distribution_center, s.name AS supplier, f.name AS product, quantity, date FROM distribution_records dr JOIN distribution_centers d ON dr.distribution_center_id = d.id JOIN suppliers s ON dr.supplier_id = s.id JOIN food_products f ON dr.food_product_id = f.id;
SELECT * FROM distribution_records WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM FoodDistributionCenters
SELECT center_name, location FROM FoodDistributionCenters ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT donor_name, email FROM Donors WHERE donor_id = 1
SELECT recipient_name, household_size FROM Recipients WHERE household_size > 5 ORDER BY household_size ASC
SELECT donation_id, donation_date, donation_amount FROM Donations ORDER BY donation_date
SELECT * FROM Donors WHERE contact_name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT donor_name, email FROM Donors WHERE donor_id = 1
SELECT center_name, location FROM FoodDistributionCenters ORDER BY center_name DESC
SELECT donation_date, donation_amount FROM Donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000
SELECT recipient_name, household_size FROM Recipients WHERE household_size <= 5
